content: create an easy custom-fitted crochet hat without a pattern if you can crochet more than one row of simple stitches you can make your own custom-fitted crochet hat this pattern is - a fool-proof method to create a hat with fast results - an easy way to measure to ensure a proper fit - a super-simple technique to create a hat that is excellent to use for quickly making gifts - a pattern that allows you to use any yarn hook and any gauge/variety of stitches to make a hat that looks great every time this is great for beginner crocheters you do not have to know how to crochet in the round or in a circle to make this hat
